monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Antipode
skills.description: When applying Chill or Burn (Debuffs) while the target already has the other Debuff, trigger an additional 125% damage hit.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Buff Catalyst
skills.description: Buffs are 20% more effective on this Monster.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Chilling Cold
skills.description: Every Water attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dexterity
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Dexterity Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Dexterity Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Glory & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fiery Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Glory
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Goblin Offense
skills.description: Aura: All Goblins in the party deal 10% more damage and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Ice Spear Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Icy Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Improved Glory
skills.description: Unique Aura: Glory (Buff) increases Critical damage by an additional 20%.

skills.name: Initial Burn
skills.description: Apply Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Napalm
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Potion Mastery
skills.description: Aura: Potion heal effects are increased by 25%.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Pyro Cracker
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Pyro Cracker Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Pyro Cracker Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Shatter
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes attacks against enemies affected by it to have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.

drops.name: Phoenix Tear
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 4 x 200
